item.title: Why are OSS developers out to get me
item.description: The term entitlement is thrown about like parentheses at a Lisp party these days. The wielders tossing their banana shaped weapons at the poor unwashed masses. Who would dare request more from those kind enough to offer their wares at perfectly reasonable prices! It is fairly common parlance amongst consumers of video games and related news media. If you frequent places such as reddit, hackernews or the social side of the Internet in general, you have no doubt come across it.
